law.catch_line: Deposit and use of savings generated as result of refunding transaction.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2012.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2012). Under the authority of KRS 7.136(1), the Reviser of Statutes has corrected a manifest clerical or typographical error in subsection (1)(g)2. of this statute during codification. The meaning of the text was not changed.
